mapper.select: SELECT PU.USER_CODE , PU.USER_NAME , DATE_FORMAT(PU.BIRTH_YMD,'%Y-%m-%d') BIRTH_YMD , IF(PU.GENDER='male','남','여') GENDER , PU.MOBILE , PU.EMAIL , PU.DEPT_CODE , DT.DEPT_NAME , PU.PART_CODE , DT.PART_NAME , PU.JOB_POS , (SELECT CHILD_NAME FROM CODE_CHILD WHERE PARENT_CODE='POS001' AND CHILD_CODE=PU.JOB_POS) JOB_NAME , DATE_FORMAT(PU.ENTER_YMD,'%Y-%m-%d') ENTER_YMD , DATE_FORMAT(PU.RETIRE_YMD,'%Y-%m-%d') RETIRE_YMD , PU.USER_IMG FROM PM_USER PU LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PD.CMP_CODE , PD.DEPT_CODE , PD.DEPT_NAME , PDP.PART_CODE , PDP.PART_NAME FROM PM_DEPT PD LEFT OUTER JOIN PM_DEPT_PART PDP ON PD.CMP_CODE = PDP.CMP_CODE AND PD.DEPT_CODE = PDP.DEPT_CODE WHERE PD.CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode}) DT ON PU.CMP_CODE = DT.CMP_CODE AND PU.DEPT_CODE = DT.DEPT_CODE AND PU.PART_CODE = DT.PART_CODE WHERE PU.CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode}
